title: Nithin M
text:
Hello, I’m Nithin. Welcome to my website! I’m an economist specializing in macroeconomics, with a passion for data analysis and programming.
Currently, I am Research Assistant at State Planning Board, Government of Kerala
Beyond research and coding, I’m also an endurance athlete, always pushing boundaries—whether in economic modeling or on the track.

title: Research
text:

The Excess Sensitivity of Consumption to Sentiments: Does the PIH hold for India? [Slides]
This is a joint work with Dr. Siddhartha Chattopadhyay of IIT Kharagpur and Dr. Sohini Sahu of IIT Kanpur. This paper was presented at the 19th Annual Conference at ISI Delhi.
